remarks: Cancellation of a nonzero factor on the right in an equation.  One-way deduction form of ~ mulcanap2d .  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 21-Feb-2020.)
statement:
mulcanapad.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
mulcanapad.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
mulcanapad.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
mulcanapad.4 $e |- ( ph -> C # 0 ) $.
mulcanap2ad.5 $e |- ( ph -> ( A x. C ) = ( B x. C ) ) $.
mulcanap2ad $p |- ( ph -> A = B ) $.
